function addToFavorites(){var object=getFavoritesObject();console.log(object);if(arguments[0].character){if(!isAlreadyFavorite({id:arguments[0].character.id},"character"))object.characterArray.push({id:arguments[0].character.id});}else if(arguments[0].planet){if(!isAlreadyFavorite({id:arguments[0].planet.id},"planet"))object.planetArray.push({id:arguments[0].planet.id});}else if(arguments[0].vehicle){if(!isAlreadyFavorite({id:arguments[0].vehicle.id,isShip:arguments[0].vehicle.isShip},"vehicle"))object.vehicleArray.push({id:arguments[0].vehicle.id,isShip:arguments[0].vehicle.isShip});}else if(arguments[0].movie){if(!isAlreadyFavorite({id:arguments[0].movie.id},"movie"))object.movieArray.push({id:arguments[0].movie.id});}window.localStorage.setItem('swFavorites',JSON.stringify(object));}function isAlreadyFavorite(item,type){var object=getFavoritesObject();switch(type){case"movie":return object.movieArray.some(function(data){return data.id===item.id;});case"character":return object.characterArray.some(function(data){return data.id===item.id;});case"planet":return object.planetArray.some(function(data){return data.id===item.id;});case"vehicle":return object.vehicleArray.some(function(data){return data.id===item.id&&data.isShip===item.isShip;});default:console.log("error, bookmark has no type");return true;}}function isJsonString(str){try{JSON.parse(str);}catch(e){return false;}return true;}function getFavoritesObject(){//window.localStorage.clear();
var object=window.localStorage.getItem('swFavorites');if(!isJsonString(object)||JSON.parse(object)===null){object={movieArray:[],vehicleArray:[],characterArray:[],planetArray:[]};window.localStorage.setItem('swFavorites',JSON.stringify(object));}else object=JSON.parse(object);return object;}function removeFromFavorites(item,type){if(!isAlreadyFavorite(item,type))return;var object=getFavoritesObject();switch(type){case"movie":object.movieArray.splice(object.movieArray.find(function(data){return data.id===item.id;}),1);break;case"character":return object.characterArray.find(function(data){return data.id===item.id;});case"planet":return object.planetArray.find(function(data){return data.id===item.id;});case"vehicle":return object.vehicleArray.find(function(data){return data.id===item.id&&data.isShip===item.isShip;});default:console.log("error, bookmark has no type");}window.localStorage.setItem('swFavorites',JSON.stringify(object));}export{addToFavorites,getFavoritesObject,isAlreadyFavorite,removeFromFavorites};
